QuestData.Title: King of the Mountain
QuestData.Description: You've just got to get my jumpbot to the tippy top of the mountain to the northwest here at Ymirheim pronto, $n!$B$BThat dastardly, no-good Blast Thunderbomb is working on his own bot, and I'm afraid he almost has it completed. We're in a race to see who's gonna be king of the mountain!$B$BOnce you jump up there, plant our battle standard in the pile of bones and show everyone that the Alliance, and my engineering skills, are the best!
QuestData.LogDescription: Frazzle Geargrinder in Ymirheim wants you to use her Geargrinder's Jumpbot to plant the Alliance Battle Standard in the skulls at the top of the mountain.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hold on a second... you haven't planted our battle standard yet!$B$BWhat's the hold up?
QuestData.RewardText: YOU DID IT! YOU DID IT!$B$B<Frazzle jumps and gives you a big hug.>$B$BOh, you're just my favorite $g hero : heroine; ever!$B$BYou think you could come back again tomorrow?
